long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
NotBuk is your go-to extension for quick and easy note-taking right in your browser's new tab. Whether you're jotting down ideas, making a to-do list, or keeping track of important information, NotBuk is here to help you stay organized and productive.

Key Features:
Rich Text Editing: Bold, italic, underline, and adjust font sizes to highlight important points.
Dark Mode: Switch to dark mode to reduce eye strain during late-night note-taking.
Real-Time Word and Character Count: Keep track of your writing with live word and character counts.
Persistent Storage: Your notes are automatically saved and will be there when you open a new tab, even if you close your browser.
Clear Formatting: Copy and paste any text with formatting. It will be pasted without the fomatting.
Check list: Convert your text into checkboxes and tick them off.

Use Cases:
To-Do Lists: Quickly jot down your daily tasks and check them off as you complete them.
Idea Logging: Capture those fleeting ideas before they slip away.
Meeting Notes: Keep track of important points during meetings without leaving your browser.
Study Notes: Make your study sessions more productive by organizing your notes effectively.
Shopping Lists: Plan your shopping trips with a handy checklist.

Why NotBuk?
NotBuk is all about simplicity and functionality. It integrates seamlessly into your browser, replacing your new tab page with a powerful note-taking tool. No more switching apps or losing your notesâ€”everything you need is right there when you open a new tab.

Stay organized, boost your productivity, and keep your notes just a new tab away with NotBuk!
